title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Virtual Neuroscience Education and Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and fundamental human anatomy knowledge
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain neurological symptom assessment procedures in virtual scenarios with over 80% accuracy
Learners analyze real patient cases through PBL tasks and logically present neurology diagnoses
Learners can comparatively explain pathophysiological mechanisms of major neurological diseases (stroke, Parkinson’s, etc.) using flipped learning materials
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
